page.title: 03PETS AND THEIR FOOD
page.content: The next job of our survey was to find out what food people gave to their pets. {DOGS 1 out of 15 people fed their dog on milk, because they think its healthy for their dog. 2 out of 15 people prefer to feed their dogs on meat, because it is nourishing.8 out of 15 people prefer to feed their dogs on chum because its the best selling food on the market. 1 out of 15 people prefer to feed their dogs on scraps because the dog food is too dear. Some people feed their dogs cornflakes because they have milk on them. { BIRDS Most people feed their birds on seed because it is good for the bird.
